name: Rocket's Sneak Attack

historicalClassification.note: Originally printed as a Trainer. Would be classified as Supporter by modern rules.

effect.text: Look at your opponent's hand. If he or she has any Trainer cards, choose 1 of them. Your opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck.

tips: Play early to see opponent's hand and remove key Trainers
Target Computer Search, Item Finder, or Professor Oak

competitiveHistory: This non-holo version is functionally identical to the holo version (#16). Rocket's Sneak Attack was a powerful disruption card for hand control strategies.

rulings.ruling: If opponent has no Trainer cards in hand, you still see their hand.
